channel.title: Lacking Natural Simplicity (Posts about ms windows)

item.title: Why does Cygwin unzip create executables that can't be executed outside Cygwin?
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description: When I unzip a MS Windows emacs distribution using the Cygwin unzip and try to execute addpm with the MS Windows Explorer as the same user, why do I get an error about not having the correct protections to execute the file?

item.title: 2GB Windows XP Hibernation Problem
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
Coding Horror points out the hotfix for the:

⚠ Windows - System Error
Insufficient system resources exist to complete the API.

error when trying to suspend a Windows XP machine with 2 gibibytes. The hotfix is hosted by Owen Cutajar and is from Microsoft KB909095.

Update: 2008-12-11: Unfortunately, it doesn't always work. Even after applying the hotfix, one of my laptops still won't hibernate.
